audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Testers

name: Munchie
short_description:
Munchie is a fun little jar program (so java required) that can help you and your coworkers (or friends) make the important decisions in life. Where to eat for lunch.

The program organizes a self-populated list of  your favorite restaurants. It features a rating system and a choose for me option calculated by a weighted random number generator that takes in account your ratings and the amount of time since last visiting the restaurant.

Note** The information you have put in is tied to your munchiedata.dat file. It only checks for this file in the same dir as you jar, so keep them together!

***Munchie is compiled with the latest version of java
summary: Munchie is small program designed to help you decide where to go eat.
